subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls became the first team to clinch a berth in this season’s M.L.S. playoffs, scoring two goals late in the first half to defeat the host Portland Timers, 2-0.
snippet: The Red Bulls became the first team to clinch a berth in this season’s M.L.S. playoffs, scoring two goals late in the first half to defeat the host Portland Timers, 2-0.
